tools.haversine_angle¶

tools.haversine_angle(origin: tuple, destination: tuple) → float¶

Computes the Haversine calcution between two (latitude, longitude) tuples to find the relative bearing between points. https://www.igismap.com/formula-to-find-bearing-or-heading-angle-between-two-points-latitude-longitude/

Points are assumed to be (latitude, longitude) pairs in e NED degrees. Bearing angle is returned in degrees from North.
